title: Can't manually increase brightness to maximum, when auto adjust is on
content:
I have auto adjust brightness enabled, which works fine, except outdoors in sunny conditions.

When out in the sun I want it to be at maximum brightness. 

However, it only turns to max if I angle the phone directly towards the sun. When I hold the phone normally, it will reduce the brightness and make it harder to see. 

In my precious phone, I would just manually override the brightness, using the slider, to max. 

On the Pixel though, the slider is already at max, even though the brightness is NOT at max. I can only drag to make it even less bright. 

This is very annoying and makes the phone hard to use outside in sun.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
